metadata.title: CVE-2024-35828 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  wifi: libertas: fix some memleaks in lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer()  In the for statement of lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer(), if the allocation of cmdarray[i].cmdbuf fails, both cmdarray and cmdarray[i].cmdbuf needs to be freed. Otherwise, there will be memleaks in lbs_allocate_cmd_buffer().
